title: Service disruption due to signal fault on Circle Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线信号故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan kerana kerosakan isyarat di Laluan Bulat
title_translations.ta: வட்டப் பாதையில் சிக்னல் கோளாறு காரணமாக சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: CCL: CLEARED: Train Services between #Bishan and #HarbourFront are now operating normally.
CCL: Estimate 5 mins additional travelling time between #bishan and #HarbourFront in both directions due to signal fault.
